messages.content: Translate this natural language query into SQL without changing the case of the entries given by the user.
show all activity in last 24 hours where actor is spencer.thellman@panther.io

SELECT p_timeline, databaseName, tableName, row_object FROM (SELECT p_event_time as p_timeline, 'panther_logs.public' as databaseName, 'panther_audit' as tableName, data as row_object FROM panther_logs.public.panther_audit_variant WHERE CONTAINS(data:actor,'spencer.thellman') AND  p_occurs_since('24 hours') ORDER by p_event_time DESC LIMIT 999)
Translate this natural language query into SQL without changing the case of the entries given by the user.
what did spencer.thellman do in the last 24 hours in our panther.audit logs?

SELECT p_timeline, databaseName, tableName, row_object FROM (SELECT p_event_time as p_timeline, 'panther_logs.public' as databaseName, 'panther_audit' as tableName, data as row_object FROM panther_logs.public.panther_audit_variant WHERE CONTAINS(data:actor,'spencer.thellman') AND  p_occurs_since('24 hours') ORDER by p_event_time DESC LIMIT 999)
Translate this natural language query into SQL without changing the case of the entries given by the user.
list of panther.audit events for spencer.thellman within last 24 hrs

SELECT p_timeline, databaseName, tableName, row_object FROM (SELECT p_event_time as p_timeline, 'panther_logs.public' as databaseName, 'panther_audit' as tableName, data as row_object FROM panther_logs.public.panther_audit_variant WHERE CONTAINS(data:actor,'spencer.thellman') AND  p_occurs_since('24 hours') ORDER by p_event_time DESC LIMIT 999)
